content: cm circular or pair straights onto lh ndl check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly if necessary repeat round 1 down to center point and then up to bobble edge notions bobble 3 sts tapestry needle size finishing 13 75 35 cm depth 37 75 96 cm at widest point weave in ends skills lace from charts i cord soak in cool water and soak wash and block to measurements worthy of note this trianglular shawl combines a bottom up construction with an intricate lace pattern to create a pretty and unique shawl the repeating motifs offer both challenge and reward making it ideal for knitters looking to practice their lace skills the shawl begins at the bottom point and increases are worked on every row the lace pattern is worked over a 24 row repeat make sure you are paying attention as you increase and decrease to maintain proper stitch count ©2025 kelbourne woolens all rights reserved 5 three shawls lace three free shawl patterns from kelbourne woolens ©2025 kelbourne
